purpose: Facilitates efficient data querying and LLM inference for AI-driven applications.
principle: Built with Rust for performance, leveraging SQL for data querying and integration with large language models for inference.
reusability: Designed as a modular engine that can be integrated into various data-driven AI applications, with support for SQL queries and LLM inference.
limitations: Primarily supports Rust and requires knowledge of SQL and LLMs for effective use.
name: spiceai
description: A portable accelerated data query and LLM-inference engine, written in Rust, for data-grounded AI apps and agents.
highlight: Portable accelerated data query and LLM-inference engine for data-grounded AI applications.
